price: 46. Tą Dieną, kai jie ją pamatys, bus tarsi jie nebuvo užsilikę (pasaulyje) tik popietę ar rytą.
arabic: كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوۡ ضُحَىٰهَا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ka-annahum yawma yarawnahā lam yalbathū illā ʿashiyyatan aw ḍuḥāhā
